page.title: 16Social concerns-Newborough.
page.content: Some of the villagers we interviewed were concerned about the shopping facilities in the village.They felt that a national chain supermarket would improve shopping facilities by providing more choice and lowering prices in general.However it must be noted that others felt that people who had chosen to reside in the area should accept the relative lack of facilities compared with towns. Some of the villagers were annoyed by the chemical spraying of crops last year.Apparently this caused the death of a number of birds. Villagers expressed concern about speeding vehicles on the main road. The lack of bus services was a grievance aired by some of the villagers.
